page.title: 02HOUSING & HOME LIFE
page.content:
ROYAL TERRACE (Private Housing)
The most common occupation was that of a{HOUSEWIFE.}The average number of persons per house was{THREE.}We found {CATS}to be the most common household pet.The favourite food was{SPAGHETTI.
THE RIGGS (Private Housing)
This street is the most modern in Falkland.{STEAK}was the most popular food.Most houses had{FOUR}residents. {DOGS}proved the most popular pets.
BRUNTON STREET (Private Housing)
Most houses had{FOUR}occupants.{CATS were the most common pets and{CHINESE {FOOD}was the favourite.
